attributes.action: Abolish the changes to IR35 implented in April 2020
attributes.additional_details: Because this is not fair to pay the same tax with permanent employee and not take the same benefits like holiday pay,sick pay or when the companies cancel with sort notice.also,we pay as well and NI of the employer when we use an umbrella company
attributes.background: Because this will massively affect the economy due to the Corona virus and especially the contractors' life.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced that these reforms have been postponed until 2021. You can read more about this here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/off-payroll-working-rules-reforms-postponed-until-2021

You may be interested in signing this petition, calling on the Government to revoke IR35 legislation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300458
